a,b,x = [int(i) for i in input().split()]

s = "0"*a + "1"*b

for i in range(x):
    s = s[:i] + "1" + s[i+1:]
    s = s[:a+b-i-1] + "0" + s[a+b-i:]

print(s)

# Solution

a, b, x = map(int, input().split())

s = '0'*a + '1'*b

for i in range(x):
    s = s[:i] + '1' + s[i+1:]
    s = s[:a+b-i-1] + '0' + s[a+b-i:]

print(s)

a, b, x = [int(i) for i in input().split()]

s = '0' * a + '1' * b

for i in range(x):
    s = s[:i] + '1' + s[i + 1:]
    s = s[:a + b - i - 1] + '0' + s[a + b - i:]

print(s)
